title: China’s AI Promise Lures Top Asia Fund Away From Korea, Taiwan
description: A top-performing Asian money manager is boosting exposure to artificial-intelligence stocks in China while retreating from those in South Korea and Taiwan, citing relatively better valuations and outlook.
content:

title: US to tap government data for AI innovation platform
description: Nationwide datasets would be harnessed by an artificial intelligence platform to train next-gen technology as the Trump administration looks to win the AI race.
content:

content:

title: Trump's Genesis Mission: AI and Science Revolution
description: President Donald Trump has launched the Genesis Mission, an executive initiative to integrate artificial intelligence with federal scientific data to expedite technological advancements. This mission aims to automate research, reduce discovery timelines, and position the U.S. as a global leader in AI excellence, prioritizing national and economic security.
content: In a bold move, U.S. President Donald Trump has signed an executive order initiating the Genesis Mission, aimed at intertwining artificial intelligence with federal scientific datasets. This ambitious project seeks to revamp scientific research by em... [872 chars]

title: Trump aims to boost AI innovation, build platform to harness government data
description: (Reuters) -President Donald Trump on Monday signed an executive order to launch a government-wide effort to build an integrated artificial intelligence platform to harness federal scientific datasets to train next-generation technologies.

title: Zoom Communications lifts annual outlook on accelerated demand for AI tools in hybrid work
description: (Reuters) -Zoom Communications raised its annual revenue and profit forecast on Monday, benefiting from hybrid work trends and the integration of artificial intelligence into its products.
content:
(Reuters) -Zoom Communications raised its annual revenue and profit forecast on Monday, benefiting from hybrid work trends and the integration of artificial intelligence into its products.

title: New platform tests AI fairness and accuracy in diabetic eye disease screening
description: Researchers have developed the world's first real-world head-to-head testing platform to determine whether commercial artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms are fit for NHS use to detect disease in a fair, equitable, transparent and trustworthy way, using diabetic eye disease as the first example.
